materials needed yarn worsted weight #4 approximately 100g of main color 50-75g of accent colors color a dark pink color b light pink color c light green color d dark green color e white color f medium pink color g mint hook size d hook or 3 25 mm 18 mm safety eyes blue eyes available at glasseyesonline com scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing black embroidery thread optional abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch f/o= fasten_off single_crochet= single_crochet stitch inc3= 3 single_crochet in the same stitch sl= slip_stitch bob st= bobble stitch half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet stitch half_double_crochet-increase= 2 half_double_crochet in the same stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head crocheted from front of nose to back of head starting with color f 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 4 3 double_crochet in the next 2 stitches 2 sl 3 double_crochet in the next 2 stitches 12 single_crochet= 26 change to color b 5 blo 6 single_crochet decrease you will be decreasing in the 2 sl from previous round 16 single_crochet decrease= 24 6 7 single_crochet increase x 3= 27 7 single_crochet in each st around 8 8 single_crochet increase x 3= 30 9 single_crochet in each st around 10 2 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 36 11 3 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 42 12 4 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 48 13 5 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 54 place eyes between rounds 11 and 12 leaving 13 holes between them 1st eye is placed before the 2nd increase count 13 holes after the first eye and place the 2nd eye if you want the sunken
